entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Parameterless struct initialization re-uses values #57870
    17.1
  • "Add 'DebuggerDisplay' attribute" might not be respecting user preferences #57867
  • IBCMerge error for EditorFeatures.Wpf in signed build #57863
  • c# Intellisense insert a new row pressing enter while it is disabled #57858
  • Deadlock in project system #57857
    17.1.P2
  • Editor Context Menu allows to view Call Hierarchy on Property Setters, but Search finds no results #57856
  • List-patterns: hold Receiver directly in bound node for implicit indexer access #57855
  • Exclude switch arms from brace placement options #57854
  • CS8073 false possitive for linq to SQL #57852
  • Strange CS0426 error where CS0201 would be more appropriate #57850
  • Feature Request: Add or Unify "Add Await" and "Introduce local for" in context actions #57849
  • Naming Rule for Event Handlers #57848
  • Changing namespace to match directory structure in whole directory #57847
  • Select builder item if nothing in the CompletionList matches what user typed #57846
  • Add an option to the C# code editor to simulate case insensitivity #57845
  • When auto implementing an interface or abstract class, I would like the ability to choose on the fly between auto generated and throwing properties #57844
  • Enhance "Move Type To {FileName}.cs" Refactoring to be Generic-Aware #57843
  • Copy data type name from variable #57842
  • C# 10 File Namespace usage autoformat #57841
  • .editorconfig editor root config display #57840
  • Partial Class File Function List Should List Only the Function in the File #57839
  • VBCSCompilerServerTests+ShutdownTests.Standard is flaky #57837

Closed

  • Outlining tag calculation should not block document open #47188
    Next
  • .NET 6 release broke switch expression formatting #57736
    17.1
  • Simplify interpolation (IDE0071): Should it not flag ToString("with-an-argument")? #57851

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean-up/enhance completion telemetry #57868
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Merges/main to features/param nullchecking #57866
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57862
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch go-to-impl to be entirely async/non-blocking. #57861
    Area-IDE
  • Added additional test from duplicate VS feedback item. #57860
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve SemanticModel handling of receiver under BoundIndexOrRangePatternIndexerAccess. #57859
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid eagerly running formatting or simplification for Extract Method #57838
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify sqlite authoring now that we're 64bit only #57836
    Area-IDE
  • Fix add-braces crash in top-level #57835
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57871
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [LSP] Use test accessor task instead of async operation to wait for LSP server shutdown in tests #57824
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57869
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove handling of certain BCL binaries from our build #57832
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Use helpers in param-nullchecking emit #57615
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57865
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Bypass IBCMerge for EditorFeatures.Wpf #57864
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ignore function types in return type inference #57713
    Area-Compilers, Approved to merge, 17.0
  • [17.0] Overload resolution was ignoring HasTypeArgumentInferredFromFunctionType for calls in expanded form #57737
    Area-Compilers, Approved to merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57872
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Port BasicNavigationBar.CodeSpit to the new test harness #57738
    Area-IDE
  • Fix deadlock switching the project context dropdown #57833
    Area-IDE
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move Default VB Version to 16.9 #57688
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Tweak SemaphoreDisposer to null out the held semaphore #57831
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • [WIP] Use cached delegate instances for method group conversions #6642
    Language-C#, Area-Compilers, Blocked, cla-already-signed, Community
  • Use InvariantCulture for generated log file name in FileLogger ctor #57816
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Use MSBuildLocator for tests #57613
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [wip] allow lsp handlers with different type arguments #57834
    Area-IDE
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
